sentences.en: ...when fledglings are almost ready to leave the nests.
sentences.cn: …当刚长出羽毛的雏鸟差不多可以离开鸟巢的时候。

sentences.en: A steep descent in an airplane like this would have blacked out a fledgling.
sentences.cn: 飞机作这样的急速下降本来是会使缺乏经验的人眼前发黑的.

sentences.en: And they are getting it from the venture - capital outfits that have backed many fledgling firms.
sentences.cn: 他们正在从投资于许多新兴公司的风投机构那里得到它.

sentences.en: At present, the trend is still fledgling market heavy weights, market trend is still not optimistic.
sentences.cn: 目前大盘权重股走势依然未稳, 大盘走势依然不容乐观.

sentences.en: China's fledgling gold market is still evolving.
sentences.cn: 中国的初期黄金市场仍在发展中.
他是个初出茅庐的作家.

sentences.en: I am a fledgling in the Boundless Lane Kitty Hawk, to experience even greater suffering.
sentences.cn: 我一只羽翼未丰的小鹰在这大千世界里要经历的磨难更大.

sentences.en: In turn the number of new market development, such as China's fledgling transparent beer market.
sentences.cn: 进而一些新的市场正在发展, 如我国刚刚起步的透明啤酒标市场.

sentences.en: It can become a 4 - 3 - 3 to accommodate the fledgling Theo Walcott.
sentences.cn: 当年轻的沃尔科特上场时,阵型可以变成4-3-3.

sentences.en: Its very success, however, exposes some serious flaws in a fledgling market.
sentences.cn: 但清华的成功也暴露了这个新市场上的一些严重缺陷.

sentences.en: Nursed the fledgling Business through an economic downturn.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退中精心料理刚起步的生意.

sentences.en: That points to one reason the fledgling revival of the vaccine sector may yet flounder: politics.
sentences.cn: 后者是可保护机体免受一种性传播病毒感染的新型疫苗,而这种病毒可引起子宫颈癌.

sentences.en: The fledgling domestic fund management industry has raised $ 18 bn so far this quarter.
sentences.cn: 本季度迄今为止,成长迅速的国内基金管理行业筹集了180亿美元的资金.

sentences.en: The news for fledgling network CW was much better.
sentences.cn: 发展迅速的CW电视网情况则好得多.

sentences.en: Thriller was enthusiastically adopted by the then fledgling music television channel MTV , which launched in 1981.
sentences.cn: 受到了当时仍羽翼未丰的音乐电视频道MTV——1981年成立——的狂热推崇.
